Interface DashboardViewController.Listener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DashboardController
    Enclosing class:
    DashboardViewController

    public static interface DashboardViewController.Listener
    Listener interface to communicate with higher controller.

    • Method Summary

        long getTotalTime()
        Returns the sum of the current duration of all projects.

      • getStage

        javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
        Passes the Stage to the viewController(for the directory selection window).
        Returns:
        the stage.

      • exportStatistics

        void exportStatistics(java.lang.String path,
                      Project project)
        This method receives the path to the directory selected by the user, it then creates a path for the new csv file. For the stats of all projects : [path]/I(Should)PlanAll_Statistics.csv. For the stats of individual project : [path]/projectTitle.csv.
        Parameters:
        path - the absolute path to the directory for the new csv file
        project - project

      • getTotalTasksCount

        javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getTotalTasksCount()
        Returns the amount of tasks the user has across all projects.
        Returns:
        a pair of integers containing the total amount of tasks done and tasks left/ongoing.

      • updateComboBox

        void updateComboBox()
        Reloads the combobox containing the projects.
